com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl

Class FileSystemAttachmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl.FileSystemAttachmentService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttachmentService

    public class FileSystemAttachmentService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttachmentService
    Implementation of the AttachmentService interface which saves and retrieves attachments from the local filesystem.
    Since:
    3.0.0
